title: Setting up an Equation
text: The first step is to set up an equation for the function, $$y=a-x$$.

title: Solving the Equation in Terms of $$y$$
text: The next step is to solve the equation in terms of $$x$$. $$y=a-x$$, therefore $$x=a-y$$.

title: Interpreting the Inverse Based on the Equation
text: After replacing $$y$$ with $$x$$ on the right side of the equation, we can see that $$f^{\left(-1\right)} x=a-x=a-y$$.
